hero.title: Mecca Field Pack
hero.subtitle: Structured for pilgrimage peaks, controlled movement flows, and heat-aware planning.

sections.title: Arrival and Entry
sections.summary: Confirm permit and accommodation documents in offline storage before movement begins.
actions: Store verified route from arrival point to accommodation.
Prepare language cards with key destination references.
Set contact protocol for group separation events.

sections.title: Mobility and Route Resilience
sections.summary: Move in defined windows and avoid unnecessary cross-zone repositioning.
actions: Predefine regroup points and time checkpoints.
Use shaded and lower-load routes where possible.
Carry a hydration and cooldown micro-plan.

sections.title: Payments and Connectivity
sections.summary: Use payment redundancy and maintain phone battery stability through high-density periods.
actions: Preserve one offline copy of booking confirmations.
Run a low-power map profile for longer field hours.
Keep one backup charging method in daily kit.

sections.title: Disruption Playbook
sections.summary: During crowd pressure spikes, prioritize controlled retreat and planned regrouping.
actions: Pause movement when corridor pressure increases.
Rejoin primary path through preselected checkpoint.
Escalate to official support lanes when needed.
